ISAF.Settings.Enabled.Name: Enable Animations
ISAF.Settings.Enabled.Hint: Master toggle for all auto-attack animations.
ISAF.Settings.OnlyOnHit.Name: Only Animate on Hit
ISAF.Settings.OnlyOnHit.Hint: If enabled, animations only play when the attack hits. If disabled, animations play on every attack roll.
ISAF.Settings.AnimationScale.Name: Animation Scale
ISAF.Settings.AnimationScale.Hint: Global scale multiplier for all animations (0.1 - 3.0).
ISAF.Settings.AnimationSpeed.Name: Animation Speed
ISAF.Settings.AnimationSpeed.Hint: Speed multiplier for projectile travel (0.5 = half speed, 2.0 = double speed).
ISAF.Settings.MissAnimation.Name: Show Miss Effect
ISAF.Settings.MissAnimation.Hint: When 'Only Animate on Hit' is enabled, show a modified animation for misses (reduced opacity, offset target).
ISAF.Settings.SoundEnabled.Name: Enable Sounds
ISAF.Settings.SoundEnabled.Hint: Allow animation scripts to play sound effects.
ISAF.Settings.SoundVolume.Name: Sound Volume
ISAF.Settings.SoundVolume.Hint: Volume level passed to animation scripts (0.0 - 1.0).
ISAF.Settings.CustomMappings.Name: Custom Macro Overrides
ISAF.Settings.CustomMappings.Hint: JSON overrides mapping weapon categories to Foundry macros. Managed via config UI.
ISAF.Settings.OpenConfig.Name: Animation Configuration
ISAF.Settings.OpenConfig.Hint: Open the animation mapping configuration panel.
ISAF.Settings.OpenConfig.Label: Configure Animations
ISAF.Settings.DebugMode.Name: Debug Mode
ISAF.Settings.DebugMode.Hint: Log detailed animation resolution info to the console for troubleshooting.
ISAF.Config.Title: SF1E Animation Configuration
ISAF.Config.NoOverrides: No per-item macro overrides configured. Right-click a weapon in a character sheet to assign a macro override.
ISAF.Notifications.SequencerMissing: SF1E Animation Framework requires the Sequencer module to be installed and active.
ISAF.Notifications.NoAnimationFound: No animation mapping found for weapon category: {category}
